doc.name: Butterfly
doc.description:
This class defines a Ptolemy II model that traces an elaborate curve called the butterfly curve. It was described by T. Fay, American Mathematical Monthly, 96(5), May, 1989. Although users will usually prefer to define models using MoML, this class illustrates how to define a model in Java.

To run this model, use:

java -classpath $PTII ptolemy.actor.gui.CompositeActorApplication -class ptolemy.domains.sdf.demo.Butterfly.Butterfly
doc.author: Christopher Hylands and Edward A. Lee
